channel.title: Why do we need to torify everything like irc icedove in the workstation again?
channel.description:
now that whonixgateway has regulated all the internet traffic through tor and the workstation is bridged with the gateway, why torify again in workstation?
Isn't it a tor over tor scene?

item.title: Why do we need to torify everything like irc icedove in the workstation again?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Please check if https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stream_Isolation answers your question.

Read full topic
